durbin.weka
Class NumericToQuartileNominal

java.lang.Object
  weka.filters.Filter
      weka.filters.SimpleFilter
          weka.filters.SimpleBatchFilter
              durbin.weka.NumericToQuartileNominal

class NumericToQuartileNominal
extends weka.filters.SimpleBatchFilter

************************************************************************* An attribute filter that converts a numeric attribute into a two-state nominal attribute split into either upper/lower quartiles or above/below median, or based on one or two predefined splits. When there are two split points, the instances in the middle are omitted.

createAttributeBins

public DynamicBin1D[] createAttributeBins(weka.core.Instances inst, int[] selectedAttributes)
*************************************** Creates a DynamicBin1D object for each selected attribute in the instances. From these DynamicBin1D objects, we can compute a variety of attribute statistics including quantile. Note: Missing values are simply skipped.

determineOutputFormat

protected weka.core.Instances determineOutputFormat(weka.core.Instances inputFormat)
******************************************* Creates an empty set of instances in the proper output format. For some filters this will be the same as the input format, for some it will involve changing the type of some attributes, or adding or removing some. In our case, we will be converting the selected numeric attributes to nominal.

quartileTransformAttributes

public weka.core.Instances quartileTransformAttributes(weka.core.Instances data, double[] cutoffs1, double[] cutoffs2, int[] selectedAttributes)
**************************************** Performs work of transforming numeric attributes into 1/0 values depending on whether the value is above 75% quartile or below 25% quartile. Instances with values in between are deleted.
